title: ADEX Weather Data Model
description: A Data Model for weather monitored observed at a certain place and time.

items.description: ADEX Data Model name. It has to be Weather
ADEX Entity type. It has to be Resource

id.description: Unique ADEX ID for the resource.

relativeHumidity.description: Observed instantaneous relative humidity (water vapour in air).

avgOverTime.description: Describes the average value of a time-series data over a specified duration in past. The duration is specified using another parameter in the value descriptor object related to this value

maxOverTime.description: Describes the maximum value of a time-series data over a specified duration in past. The duration is specified using another parameter in the value descriptor object related to this value

instValue.description: Describes the instantaneous value (associated with the current timestamp) of a time varying quantity.

minOverTime.description: Describes the minimum value of a time-series data over a specified duration in past. The duration is specified using another parameter in the value descriptor object related to this value

dewPoint.description: Observed temperature to which air must be cooled to become saturated with water vapor.

windDirection.description: Observed wind direction. Measured in degrees clockwise from due north.
